reviewDescription: If you are looking for a party speaker with loud sound and heavy base and a budget of around 6k, then go for it without a second thought. It's an absolute beast, it has got several Equalizer modes, you can adjust the bass and treble as per your need.Sound quality is crystal clear....loudness mind-blowing üî•, bass is thumping, you can feel the vibrations when kept on any platform( provided you have to adjust the bass at max ) , no regrets on purchasing this awesome product, not a boat lover(cuz boat has downgraded it's quality over past few years) but this speaker is an exception. Battery backup is good 2-3 hrs of playtime at 60% volume. You can play music while charging (endless battery backup). Size is an issue as it is very big and is not at all portable but if you want a good party speaker with high quality sound output then this speaker is for you.

reviewTitle: Battery not satisfied public speaking, connected with external mic.
reviewDescription: Sound is awesome, base is satisfied. 5 Equalizer option as per your choice. Battery backup is as claimed in the box. But I'm giving only 3 star since I purchase it for small family function and connected with external mic not with the one in the box, to my surprise the battery from full got drained completely in just 15 minutes of speaking with external mic in full volume. Battery department is where I find it lacks specially if you buy for public speaking. Otherwise good for enjoying music. 2025 after 1 year I'm editing, don't buy this product exactly after 1 year there is a distorted sound when I'm playing music, I have send for repairing in one of the service center in Guwahati and they can't find the cause of destortion, they asked for one more day to rectify, to which I agreed. Let's see if they can repair it. Go for other product like JBL, Tribit they justify more for what you pay. Disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è.
